remarks: Subject to the conditions coming from ~ mbfi1fseq , the sequence of simple functions are all less than the target function ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itg2i1fseq.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
itg2i1fseq.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
itg2i1fseq.3 $e |- ( ph -> P : NN --> dom S.1 ) $.
itg2i1fseq.4 $e |- ( ph -> A. n e. NN ( 0p oR <_ ( P ` n ) /\ ( P ` n ) oR <_ ( P ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
itg2i1fseq.5 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. RR ( n e. NN |-> ( ( P ` n ) ` x ) ) ~~> ( F ` x ) ) $.
itg2i1fseqle $p |- ( ( ph /\ M e. NN ) -> ( P ` M ) oR <_ F ) $.
$d F n x $.
$d M n $.
$d P n x $.
